alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rockbridge, northeastern Bedford and central Amherst Counties and the City of Buena Vista through 745 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sedalia, or near Big Island, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista... Glasgow... Forks Of Buffalo... Big Island... Forest... Coleman Falls... and Cornwall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
